title: We've Got The BEST DEAL Around The Area! $1629 For This 1x1 Today Only
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 707 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Settle in Style!', 'Your Home Your Canvas.', 'Featuring a new expanded fitness center, business center w/ WiFi lounge, redesigned clubroom and beautifully refinished homes!', 'Apartment Living : Evolved.', "At the hub of everything haute and hip in Southeast Denver you'll find Legend Oaks Apartments, where an evolution in apartment living is emerging.", "Here you can walk to Havana Street's fun and funky shopping, eateries and events.", "Bike to Cherry Creek's abundant recreation and parks, or spend the day there boutique-browsing and gallery-hopping.", "This prime location offers easy access to I-225 and is minutes from downtown, Denver Tech Center, Children's Hospital Colorado and DIA.", "Then come home to Legend Oaks' evolving collection of 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments, completely redesigned to complement today's lifestyle.", "Here you'll find beautifully refinished homes: All-new kitchens with new cabinets, countertops and clean steel appliances.", 'Nine-foot ceilings with crown molding, chic updated lighting, fresh wall colors and a cozy gas fireplace.', 'And of course, your must-have conveniences such as a full-size washer/dryer, private garage and plentiful storage.', 'Close to I-25, Close to I-225, Cherry Creek Schools, Cherry Creek Challenge School, RTD 83L, RTD 11, RTD 120, RTD light rail, Close to light rail, Gardens on Havana, Close to CU Hospital, Close to Anschutz Medical Campus, Close to Buckley Air Force Base, Close to Cherry Creek, Close to DTC, Cherry Creek Reservoir, Cherry Creek State Park, Highline Canal Trail', 'Features:', 'Remodeled interiors, 9 foot ceilings with crown molding, Large walk-in closets, Twin basin vanities*, Refinished bathrooms with large oval tubs*, Cozy gas fireplaces*, Full size washer / dryer included, Open floorplans, Espresso cabinetry, Central heat and AC, Chic lighting & wall colors, Window coverings, Built-in shelving*, Kitchen pantry*, Bedroom access to patio*, Clean steel & black appliances, Private patio / balcony with storage', '*Select Apartment Homes', 'Community Amenities:', 'Mature landscaping, Off-leash dog park, Newly remodeled fitness center, Newly remodeled business center with free wi-fi, Relaxing spa, Year-round resort style pool, Electronic payments accepted, Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply), Gated entry after hours, Picnic gazebo & BBQ area, Private detached garages available, Cherry Creek School District', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly!',
